document_data.name: Blue Feather
document_data.mainbody: The '''Blue Feather''' were an [[orc]] tribe of the [[High Moor]].
document_data.Relationships: Blue Feather orcs were among those tribes treated with hostility by the [[human]]s and [[goblinoid]]s of the High Moor, such as the [[Belcondi]] and [[Girondi]] [[barbarian]] tribes.
document_data.History: Around the {{YearlinkName|1354}}, orcs of the Blue Feather Clan joined with other orcs and [[goblin]]s under the leadership of [[Jagurt Redclaw]] and mustered in the [[Misty Forest]] to mount an assault on [[Daggerford]].
